item.title: Alison Pill Signs with Gersh (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Tony-nominated actress Alison Pill has signed with Gersh for representation in all areas. Pill will soon be seen in the Paramount+ miniseries “Unspeakable: The Murder of Jonbenét Ramsey opposite
